name: Lifetime Brands, Inc.
description: Lifetime Brands, Inc. is a premier global designer, developer, and marketer of a wide range of consumer products, with a focus on housewares, kitchenware, and home décor. Founded in 1945, the company has built a robust portfolio of leading brands including KitchenAid, Farberware, and Mikasa, catering to consumers' needs and preferences across different markets. Lifetime Brands operates through various channels, including retail, e-commerce, and direct-to-consumer sales, ensuring its products reach consumers in multiple ways. The company emphasizes innovation and quality, continually investing in product development and brand marketing to enhance its product offerings and maintain competitive advantage. With a commitment to sustainability, Lifetime Brands is actively working to reduce its environmental impact through responsible sourcing and eco-friendly product designs. The company's mission is to provide consumers with high-quality products that enhance their everyday lives, while also fostering strong relationships with its retail partners and suppliers.
